SELECT u.id, u.*, ur.score, uc.fighters fighters, f.id as head, f.src as headSrc FROM user_rank ur INNER JOIN user u ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN upload_file f on u.head = f.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, GROUP_CONCAT(fighter_no) AS fighters FROM user_fighter WHERE quarter = #{quarter} AND total >= 5 GROUP BY user_id )uc ON u.id = uc.user_id WHERE ur.quarter = #{quarter} ORDER BY ur.score DESC LIMIT 50
